abstract: Sales figures for some trucks remained strong, but G.M., Ford, Toyota and Volkswagen all said severe winter weather had taken a toll on American sales of new cars.
snippet: Sales figures for some trucks remained strong, but G.M., Ford, Toyota and Volkswagen all said severe winter weather had taken a toll on American sales of new cars.
lead_paragraph: Severe cold weather across much of the country stalled new-vehicle sales in February, even as sales of some trucks and sport utility vehicles remained strong, automakers reported on Monday.

headline.main: Carmakers Say Sales Were Sluggish in Chilly February
headline.print_headline: Carmakers Say Sales Were Sluggish in Chilly February
